subject: AI & Agents
title: Mixture of Experts: Smart Routing
description: A quick, practical guide to Mixture of Experts: Smart Routing.

hook.text: What if a massive model only used a fraction of itself for each question? That's mixture of experts.

buildup.text: Traditional models activate all parameters for every input, wasting compute on irrelevant neurons.

discovery.text: MoE models route each input to specialized sub-networks, using only relevant experts per query.

twist.text: GPT-4 is rumored to be a MoE model. Total parameters are huge, but active ones per query are modest.

climax.text: MoE lets models be both large and efficient â€” the best of both worlds for next-generation AI.

punchline.text: Don't wake every expert for every question. Ask the right one.

quiz.question: How do Mixture of Experts models improve efficiency?
options: They route each input to only the relevant specialist sub-networks
They use every parameter for every query
They reduce the total number of parameters
